title: How to Find Jelly World on Neopets

steps.title: Type Jelly to the end of the Neopets link (Ex:
steps.content: Type Jelly to the end of the Neopets link (Ex: http://www.neopets.com/jelly/ ) or Click Here Jelly World .

steps.title: Click on the Giant Jelly for a free daily jelly.
steps.content: Click on the Giant Jelly for a free daily jelly. Watch out though - sometimes it's a poisonous or glowing jelly!
